text:
## Conversation Summary

### What We Did:
- Updated a Google Sheets link in the diagnostic page
- Changed the URL from a placeholder/example link to a real Google Sheets document containing furniture product data

### Current Work:
- Working on the **diagnostic page** (`/home/user/project/app/diagnostic/page.tsx`)
- The page already has a "База товаров" (Product Database) button that opens Google Sheets
- Successfully updated the Google Sheets URL to: `https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1e0P91PfGKVIuSWDY0ceWkIE7jD-vzD_xrIesBeQno1Y/edit?gid=0#gid=0`

### Next Task:
- Add a new button called "Обновить данные по базе товаров" (Update Product Database Data)
- This button should fetch and update furniture product size information from the Google Sheets document
- Need to implement functionality to read data from the Google Sheets and update the local product database

### Technical Context:
- The project uses Next.js 14 with App Router
- The diagnostic page is a client component (uses "use client" directive)
- The project has furniture-related utilities and types in the lib folder
- There's already a furniture products API endpoint at `/app/api/furniture-products/route.ts`

### Files Being Modified:
- `/home/user/project/app/diagnostic/page.tsx` - Main diagnostic page where we're adding the new button and functionality
